Windows XP Download

All download links leads to genuine files only.

Notes

  • For x86, SP3 and for x64, SP2 are the last released ISO’s available. x64 version was released in English language only.

  • x86 VL ISO’s can be activated with the key XCYBK-2B3KV-G8T8F-WXJM7-WCTYT

  • x64 VL ISO’s can be activated with the key VCFQD-V9FX9-46WVH-K3CD4-4J3JM

  • Microsoft provides download links for Windows XP on MVS but for them, you need to pay a high subscription fee. For this reason, we need to host files on 3rd party. You can check here on how to be sure that files are genuine.

  • If you need links for any other Windows/office file which is not listed below, please contact here.
